definition: aardwolf (Proteles cristatus), a small insectivorous relative of the hyena
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Any self-evolver must be a coyote trickster.
sentences.chinese: 所有自進化者必須是像土狼一樣高明的魔術師。

sentences.english: It was trying to get at the brain tissue but couldn't.
sentences.chinese: 土狼想喫掉它的腦組織，但沒有成功。

sentences.english: The Chinese are the hyenas of the world. The British came like ravenous lions.
sentences.chinese: 中國人是世界上的土狼，英國人則像一隻貪婪的獅子。

sentences.english: You mean you get the hyena, and I choose between the hippo and the giraffe?
sentences.chinese: 你是說你挑了土狼剩下河馬和長頸鹿給我挑？

sentences.english: When otherwise unoccupied, the rancher engaged in hunting down coyotes.
sentences.chinese: 沒事的時候，大牧場主人就會去獵殺土狼。

sentences.english: Simba, he let the hyenas take over the pride lands.
sentences.chinese: 辛巴，他讓那些土狼接管了得意之地。

sentences.english: Unlike real hyenas, the earth wolf has small teeth and a weak jaw.
sentences.chinese: 土狼不像真正的鬣狗，它的牙齒小，頜骨沒有勁。

definition: wolverine (Gulo gulo), also named 貂熊[diao1 xiong2]
